alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 11:55AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Elko County through 1230 PM PDT... At 1155 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pequop Summit, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oasis and Pequop Summit. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County
